meanings.sent1: They will televise the game tonight.
meanings.sent2: The news station will televise the press conference live.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if they will televise the cat show next.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to televise her happiness to the world.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the parade were televise in vivid detail.

meanings.sent1: The satellite will televise the signal to the viewers.
meanings.sent2: They plan to televise the documentary across the country.
meanings.sent3: It's amazing how they can televise events in real-time.
meanings.sent4: His emotions seemed to televise through the screen.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature was televise into every home.
